title: Yeah, if custom item sets could stop getting deleted after a patch
body:
That'd be great.

Sick of putting 30 mins in, getting some item sets sorted, just to find out that next patch they are gone.

replies.body:
I don;t remember off the top of my head where the are (google will tell you) but the item sets are client side, and thus are actual files you can copy out of your game folder as a backup, then copy back in after the patch.

Is it every patch though? Becuasse you'd expect it to only be the big ones, and I think in most peoples cases this patch they were just 'edited' to remove the changed items rather than deleted completely. If it's happening for you every patch (major or minor) then you should probably consider taking it up with support cause it shouldn't be happening. In the mean time, backing up your sets is the best bet.

Mine was the original ones and had deleted items (upgraded trinkets and such)

But yeah item sets don't get deleted by patches.
